.. _variable_python_class:
.. _Variable:

.. role:: python(code)
   :language: py

.. tags:: variable, python, class

Variable (python class)
========================================================================

.. seealso::
   :ref:`math concept<variable_math_concept>` | :ref:`python sample<variable_python_sample>`

This section presents the :python:`Variable` python class.

.. note::
   Currently, the development of *punctilious* is focused on propositional logic. Support for bound and free variables in first-order logic is not yet implemented.

This class models a :ref:`variable<variable_math_concept>` declared in a :ref:`universe-of-discourse<universe_of_discourse_math_concept>`.

.. module:: punctilious
   :noindex:
.. autoclass:: Variable
   :members:
